channel.title: Make gates open? pi
channel.description:
Is there a way that gates can be opened
base is PI
if possible a handler so that all gates use the same method
Thanks

item.title: Make gates open? pi
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:13, topic:477925”][quote author=Clawz fury link=topic=596123.msg4197820#msg4197820 date=1357771441]

[size=10pt]Your making a remake[/size] yet can’t even get gates to work? Use arrays mate.

[size=15pt]Your making a remake[/size] yet can’t even get gates to work? Use arrays mate.

[size=20pt]Your making a remake[/size] yet can’t even get gates to work? Use arrays mate.

oh god
[/quote]

Actually, Frell sent me a Private Message about this User:

All the details you need are the fact that he is spamming other websites to get all of his players (including RS06), and you HAVE to donate to play the beta.

You might want to “OLawd” that too.[/quote]
Why do you get private messages from staff

Read full topic

item.title: Make gates open? pi
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I know there is a way, I just do not know how. Gates are made of 2 models each. So when you click one, they both have to “swing” open.
I’m sure you could make it so when you click the gate, you teleport to the otherside (really not hard at all)
Or you could make a method to when you click the gate, it would delete the obects, rotate them, and move them to the correct position.
3rd option. Find a PI that has working gates and steal it.

Read full topic
